name: tlmscatps

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c1, ctps), wcel(c1, ctrg))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ TopMod, c1 ∈ TopSp, c1 ∈ TopRing)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c1, ctps))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c1, ctrg))
-| wi(wcel(c1, ctrg), wcel(c1, ctps))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopMod → c1 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopMod → c1 ∈ TopRing)
⊣ (c1 ∈ TopRing → c1 ∈ TopSp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c1, ctps))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c1, ctrg))
-| wi(wcel(c1, ctrg), wcel(c1, ctps))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopMod → c1 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopMod → c1 ∈ TopRing)
⊣ (c1 ∈ TopRing → c1 ∈ TopSp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c1, ctrg))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c1, ctps))
-| wi(wcel(c1, ctrg), wcel(c1, ctps))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopMod → c1 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c1 ∈ TopRing → c1 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ c1 =(Scalar ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctlm), wcel(c1, ctps))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c0))

comment: The scalar ring of a topological module is a topological space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
